M06-2X Min Geometry.string:
$SYSTEM MWORDS=20 $END
 $CONTRL RUNTYP=Optimize $END
 $STATPT OptTol=1e-5 NStep=500 $END
 $CONTRL SCFTYP=UHF $END
 $CONTRL MAXIT=40 $END
 $DFT DFTTYP=M06-2X $END
 $CONTRL ICHARG=0  MULT=1 $END
 $BASIS GBASIS=N31 NGAUSS=6 NPFUNC=1 $END
 $SCF DIRSCF=.TRUE. $END

M06-2X Max SP Energy.string:
$SYSTEM MWORDS=20 $END
 $CONTRL RUNTYP=Energy $END
 $STATPT OptTol=1e-5 NStep=500 $END
 $CONTRL SCFTYP=UHF $END
 $CONTRL MAXIT=40 $END
 $DFT DFTTYP=M06-2X $END
 $CONTRL ICHARG=0  MULT=1 $END
 $BASIS GBASIS=N311 NGAUSS=6 NDFUNC=1 NPFUNC=1 DIFFSP=.TRUE. $END
 $SCF DIRSCF=.TRUE. $END
